name: Spider cave (pro_grammeur)
description:
This game thakes place in a collapsing cave where a little spider need to escape. You will need to avoid multiple obstacle to survive. Have fun playing this litte game!

--------------------

control

Left click to hang

Right click to jump

A/D to control the swingin speed

--------------------

This game was created in the minijam 123 with the theme web and the restriction There is no ground. This is my first game jam and I worked alone
